long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Most people read interesting things all the time, but struggle to recall what they read soon after. 

That's why we're building mindreps, an in-browser tool that uses spaced repetition to test you on what you've read, in turn drilling it into your memory. 

So that you can remember what you read and become knowledgeable ninjas! 
Try mindreps today to sharpen your mental fitness!
